welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kefar Sava! Get ready to experience the charm of this vibrant city, known for its beautiful parks, lively markets, and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kefar Sava has to offer.

restaurants.name: Moses (מוזס)
restaurants.description: Moses (מוזס) is a burger joint located in כפר סבא.
restaurants.address: 14 Berl Katsnelson St. (btwn Motta Gur St. & Weizman St.), כפר סבא 44405

restaurants.name: Landwer Cafe
restaurants.description: Landwer Cafe is a café located in כפר סבא.

restaurants.name: Lehem Erez (לחם ארז)
restaurants.description: Lehem Erez (לחם ארז) is a restaurant located in כפר סבא.
restaurants.address: 55 Rothschild St. (at Weizman St.), כפר סבא

restaurants.name: תפארת הפלאפל והשווארמה
restaurants.description: תפארת הפלאפל והשווארמה is a falafel restaurant located in כפר סבא.
restaurants.address: 147 Wiezmann St. (at Tel Hay St.), כפר סבא 44229

restaurants.name: Piano! Piano!
restaurants.description: Piano! Piano! is a italian restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sde Dov Airport, serving domestic flights within Israel.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Sde Dov Airport, used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Ben Gurion International Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Ben Gurion International Airport, serving most airlines and destinations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.
